verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was sinking deep in sin, Far from the peaceful shore, Very deeply stained within, Sinking to rise no more; But the Master of the sea Heard my despairing cry, From the waters lifted me, Now safe am I.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love lifted me! (even me) Love lifted me! (even me) When nothing else could help. Love lifted me. Love lifted me! (even me) Love lifted me! (even me) When nothing else could help. Love lifted me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All my heart to Him I give, Even to Him I’ll cling, In His blessed presence live, Even His praises sing. Love so mighty and so true merits My soul’s best songs; Faithful, loving service, too, To Him belongs.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
